Our FREE email update is sent to you once every two weeks, bringing you crochet information, patterns, ideas, tips and the latest news.

Great Product Finds

Square® Crochet Hooks by Kollage Yarns

Give crocheters a hook and a ball of yarn and they can crochet just about anything! And while the tools are simple, having the right crochet hook helps us do our best work and can save hours of frustration. Kollage Yarns has just come out with a new American-made hook that is not only beautiful to look at, but designed to be ergonomically suited to your hands, decreasing stress and strain. The square wood handles sourced from U.S.-grown maple are warm to the touch and fit comfortably in your hand, making the hooks a good choice for crocheters who have arthritis, carpal tunnel or stiffness in their finger or joints.

The in-line hooks come with either rounded or pointed tips to match personal preference and ease of use for all types of crochet projects. Both styles come in sizes A/0/2mm through L/11/8mm hooks with smaller-size hooks made of stainless steel and larger sizes manufactured from high-grade aluminum.

Spring 2016
Jump into spring with an instant download of 25 innovative and inspiring crochet patterns, including the light and airy Ravenna Tank featured on the cover! Prepare for transitional weather with projects from easy pieces for layering to sleeveless tops. Build your spring wardrobe with both classic and fashion forward crochet garments such as hoodies, cardigans, jackets, tanks and tunics. Scarves, totes and shawls abound in this issue! The spring issue is rounded out with beautiful crochet projects for the home and an adorable dress for little girls! Don't wait -- download (or subscribe) today!
Note From The Editor
Learn It, Do It!
We have many new features in this exciting spring issue! In addition to a collection of very pretty, fun, innovative and satisfying projects, I hope that you find Crochet! to be entertaining and educational. For that reason, we are adding the Yarn Shop Profile, the Fiber Focus series and the Blogger Spotlight.

Square® Crochet Hooks by Kollage Yarns

And while the tools are simple, having the right crochet hook helps us do our best work and can save hours of frustration.
